name: Ligia Gutierrez
what_you_do: I am dedicated to helping individuals and organizations unlock their potential, align with their values, and thrive in every aspect of their professional and personal lives.
who_you_serve: For individuals, I create a supportive and encouraging space where you can reflect, grow, and take actionable steps toward your goals. For organizations, I partner with managers and leadership teams to cultivate collaboration, connection, and a sense of belonging.
social_proof: I am proud to have led large and small workshops, retreats, conferences, events, and training for staff, volunteers, clients, youth leaders, and college-age young adults. Before stepping down from my 22-year career as a nonprofit executive, I was the first Latin American to be the YMCA Youth & Government State Director for the state of Texas civic engagement program. I transformed the lives of thousands of youth leaders and created a strong staff and volunteer community across the state and nationally.
signature_programs: Certified in Leading & Coaching Others, Money Breakthrough Coach, Master of Science In Management & Leadership, and Bachelor in Social Work. Trainer in multiple subjects, including Facilitation Skills, Deepening the Diversity Initiative, Cultural Lenses: Building Relationships Through Cultural Lenses, Adult-Learning Concepts, Peer Mediation Trainer, Program Management & Development, Training Others, Grant Writing Faculty, and Fiscal Management & Budgeting.
business_focus: Helping individuals and organizations unlock their potential, align with their values, and thrive in every aspect of their professional and personal lives.
service_provided: leadership coaching, career coaching, organizational development, team building, executive coaching
